text: Ivan Kozlov (born 6 May 1978) is a Ukrainian ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill and large hill events at the 1998 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Ukraine Category:Ski jumpers at the 1998 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Kyiv
title: Ivan Kozlov (ski jumper)
